docs.lead_paragraph: THE spell of the Mediterranean --its light, its warmth, its color, its changeful, dramatic history--is one to which, as readers of "Mare Nostrum" well know, Vicente Blasco Ibanez is intensely susceptible.

headline.main: Latest Works of Fiction; THE HYPHEN

docs.snippet: THE spell of the Mediterranean --its light, its warmth, its color, its changeful, dramatic history--is one to which, as  readers of "Mare Nostrum" well know, Vicente Blasco Ibanez is intensely susceptible.
